pullrequest.title: Remove TinyXML symbols from public API

content.raw: Yeah, I've also been looking at this recently. But I think tick-tocking across major versions is more gentle on downstream users, especially considering that we do major releases more often than most projects. It's also what we've done in the past and probably what our users already expect. If we want to change this, I'd suggest we discuss it first, then only adopt it for upcoming versions.
content.html: Yeah, I've also been looking at this recently. But I think tick-tocking across major versions is more gentle on downstream users, especially considering that we do major releases more often than most projects. It's also what we've done in the past and probably what our users already expect. If we want to change this, I'd suggest we discuss it first, then only adopt it for upcoming versions.
